Set the colours, pointshapes and linetypes for lineplot.
standardize_column_width()
Calculate the column widths for plots that should be later combined with combine_plots().
standardize_pattern_spacing()
Calculate the pattern spacing, so it is equal within a plot. Currently works only for two combined plots!
